issue.title: [C++] Upgrade clang bits to 5.0 once promoted to stable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1729](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1729). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This includes our CI toolchain and pinned clang-format version. According to http://apt.llvm.org/ 5.0 is still the "qualification branch" where 4.0 is stable

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1729?focusedCommentId=16660725) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
We are using 6.0 now, so closing as obsolete.
